artist: Jacques Callot; Published by Israel Henriet
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. John Andrus, III
description: illustrated book with etchings, title page, frontispiece and 488 etchings on 122 plates; published in Paris in 1636
provenance: Baron Horace Landau-Finaly, with his bookplate. (William H. Schab Gallery, Inc., New York); purchased from Schab by MIA with funds provided by John E. Andrus III, 1983.
